name: Stain Simulator
description:
It's an evolution of this little project:

https://lernakow.itch.io/one-hundred-walkers

A result of a conversation on DragonRuby Game Toolkit Discord between me, Akzidenz and kniknoo.

Click on patterns to choose your chemise (shirt), click on liquids to choose its demise. Click elsewhere for a new stain (stains are traces of 100 random walkers making 100 steps each).
